comment:
Nose: vanilla, cherry
Tasting notes of smooth vanilla, spicy finish but well balanced, slightly tannic

"Solid Sunday sipper. High proof with decent flavor (spice, nut, vanilla) to accompany its moderate proof. I am not an expert on cognac, but I can certainly tasted the cognac finish. Interesting flavor for those that like to try new things. "
Very nice and the cognac sweetens it up and rounds it out nicely
Decent Bourbon but its very mild in offering any real memorable flavor profile from the Cognac FINISH.
